items.name: The Supreme Overture
items.description: The first upgrade received in this match will be at diamond level.

items.name: Golden Gala
items.description: All upgrades received in this battle will be at gold tier.

items.name: Prism Team
items.description: All upgrades received in this battle will be at diamond tier.

items.name: The Ultimate End
items.description: The final upgrade received in this match will be at diamond level.

items.name: Golden Promenade
items.description: The first upgrade received in this match will be at gold tier.

items.name: Golden End
items.description: The final upgrade received in this battle will be at the gold tier.

items.name: Sublimation Upgrade
items.description: Upgrades in this match will be at silver, gold, then diamond levels.

items.name: 7DEGREE 1 SILVER
items.description: All upgrades in this match will be at silver tier.

items.name: Start with a 3 Gold Champion
items.description: Start with a random 3-gold champion.

items.name: General Upgrade
items.description: Start with a random 2-star 1-gold general.

items.name: Start with a 2 Gold Champion
items.description: Start with a random 2-gold champion.

items.name: Cloning Machine
items.description: Start the match with 1 Replicator.

items.name: 3 Generals
items.description: Start with 3 random 1-gold generals.

items.name: General Distribution
items.description: 2 times per stage, get 1 expensive champion for free. The closer to the end of the game, the higher the value.

items.name: General Meeting Conference
items.description: Each stage, receive 1 champion suitable for your squad.

items.name: Artifact Equipment Pack
items.description: Start with 1 Artifact Equipment Pack (choose 1 strong equipment).

items.name: Component Equipment Package
items.description: Start with 2 component equipment packages.

items.name: Complete Equipment Package
items.description: Start with a complete equipment package.

items.name: Light Equipment
items.description: Choose 1 of 5 late-game Light Items (more powerful versions of full items).

items.name: Support Equipment Package
items.description: Start with 1 Support equipment package.

items.name: Tactical Crown
items.description: Start with 1 Tactical Crown (increases the maximum number of champions by +1).

items.name: Equipment Package Party
items.description: All equipment will drop as component equipment packs.

items.name: Let's Get Fired Up
items.description: Start with 1 Golden Shovel and 1 Golden Pan. The forging hammer will not fall.

items.name: Gold Subscription Package
items.description: Each stage, receive a random amount of gold. All players receive equal amounts of gold.

items.name: Golden Pot
items.description: In round 6-1, all players still in the match will share a pot containing 250 gold.

items.name: Equipment Bonus
items.description: Get gold when you combine equipment.

items.name: Starting Gold
items.description: Start with 7 bonus gold.

items.name: Dam Cua
items.description: Monsters will be replaced by Scuttlers, giving additional rewards when defeated!

items.name: Kicker Training
items.description: Start with 1 Stone Man with 3 seals permanently attached.

items.name: Sign Up for Treasures
items.description: Each stage, receive 1 random treasure from a diverse equipment pool.

items.name: Dancing Crab
items.description: Monsters will be replaced by Scuttlers, giving additional rewards when defeated! Giant crabs are EXTREMELY DANGEROUS.

items.name: Upgrade Ring Swap
items.description: Upgrades will be awarded earlier in this battle.

items.name: Early Awakening
items.description: The second Awakening Fruit will appear in rounds 2-6 instead of 3-6.

items.name: Beach Volleyball
items.description: Beach Volleyball! Get a beach ball that the Spirit Beast can juggle!

items.name: Victory Society
items.description: After Top 4, surviving players receive 10 gold and 2 Component Equipment Packs.

items.name: King of Noise
items.description: The shopping round has new competitors!

items.name: Grand Final
items.description: This is the Grand Final! Hero, please move forward on your own.

items.name: Indian Collection
items.description: Start with 3 random presses.

items.name: Confrontation Masters
items.description: The last 2 surviving players receive 70 gold to have a decisive battle to the death.

items.name: Reconnaissance Squad
items.description: Get +1 turns in exchange for Upgrades in this battle.

items.name: Howling Abyss
items.description: Start the match with 5 random 1-gold generals.

items.name: Warrior Arena
items.description: Every time a player is eliminated, the surviving players receive 3 gold for each eliminated player.

items.name: Cosmic Journey
items.description: Get free redemptions at the start of each period.

items.name: Gift From Gwen
items.description: After the first 3 rounds of shopping, Gwen will give the player 1 component equipment and 1 pair of scissors that can cut the equipment apart.

items.name: Golden Shovel
items.description: Start with 1 Gold Shovel.

items.name: Mel's Blessings
items.description: Mel will give you a powerful treasure when the player has 40 health remaining.

items.name: Full Shopping Circle
items.description: Generals in the shopping round have 1 additional equipment component.

items.name: Treasure Stone Man
items.description: Start with 1 Stone Man permanently equipped with 1 Unstable Treasure Chest. At the end of the game, the Stone Man will be equipped with a second Unstable Treasure Chest.

items.name: Treasures
items.description: At stages 4-7, choose a pack of 5 powerful treasures.

items.name: Golden Pan
items.description: Start with 1 Gold Pan.

items.name: Super Treasure Divine Dragon
items.description: Super Treasure Divine Dragon

items.name: Divine Dragon Messenger
items.description: Divine Dragon Messenger

items.name: HACK: Treasure
items.description: The stage 4 NPC ring is replaced by a redeemable Treasure!

items.name: Dragon Tribe Package
items.description: Dragon Tribe Package

items.name: There is no cycle of encounter.
items.description: There are no reunions in this match.
